channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gate open for entry to river - unsafe for children dogs etc, 15th June
item.description:

item.title: Disused (probably) light grey electrical cabinet on street with door missing and electrics exposed to elements, 14th June
item.description:
Disused (probably) light grey electrical cabinet on street with door missing and electrics exposed to elements On south side of George Street 10m west of junction with Gloucester Place outside Portman Towers, 95 George Street, W1H 7HN I'm guessing this is an an old Westminster Cable distribution cabinet (but could be another supplier) which is now disused and seemingly abandoned. If still in use it needs to be secured and made safe, if unused and abandoned it needs to be removed and the pavement reinstated.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): George Street, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped mattress, 14th June
item.description:
This is becoming a recurring spot for dumping waste. This is the second or third mattress this year alone. Great if the council could find a longer term solution such as installing cameras.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ravensbourne Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet
